SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.inputs

Class InputHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.inputs.InputHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputObserved, Serializable, Runnable
public class InputHandler extends Object implements InputObserved, Runnable, Serializable
This class is an input handler. It reads input from the console and notifies the observers.
